featured_events.name: Robotics Workshop
featured_events.description: Hands-on workshop on building autonomous robots and automation systems using Arduino and sensors. Participants learned fundamental robotics design principles and practical implementation.

featured_events.name: Line Follower Robot Competition
featured_events.description: A fun, competitive event where participants design and build autonomous line-following robots to test their precision and speed.

mega_events.name: National Robotics Challenge 2025
mega_events.description: A nationwide robotics competition hosted by IEEE NSU RAS SBC, featuring teams from universities across Bangladesh showcasing advanced autonomous robots.

featured_events.name: Workshop on Advanced MATLAB and Simulink for Renewable Energy Research
featured_events.description: A professional-level workshop focused on MATLAB and Simulink applications in renewable energy research, modeling, and simulation for sustainable power systems.

featured_events.name: Power Engineering Seminar
featured_events.description: A technical seminar on renewable energy integration, smart grids, and energy storage systems presented by experts from academia and industry.

featured_events.name: Administrative Officers Training Program
featured_events.description: A leadership and management training workshop for executive members to improve project organization, communication, and event execution.

mega_events.name: Green Energy Summit
mega_events.description: A mega symposium on renewable energy technologies, sustainable power grids, and global clean energy transitions.

featured_events.name: Industrial Innovation and Automation Talk
featured_events.description: An industry-driven session focused on industrial automation trends, manufacturing innovation, and modern control systems.

featured_events.name: Industry Academia Collaboration Summit
featured_events.description: A collaborative platform between academic researchers and industry professionals to discuss innovation, research, and skill-building opportunities.

mega_events.name: Industry Innovation Expo 2025
mega_events.description: An industrial exhibition and conference showcasing the latest in automation, manufacturing, and smart technologies.

featured_events.name: Women in Tech Leadership Meetup
featured_events.description: A networking and leadership event empowering women in technology through mentorship, panel discussions, and skill development workshops.

featured_events.name: Humanitarian Engineering for Change
featured_events.description: An initiative focusing on engineering solutions to real-world humanitarian challenges in rural and underserved communities.

featured_events.name: Tech Talk: Breaking Barriers in STEM
featured_events.description: An inspiring talk by women leaders in STEM fields discussing opportunities, challenges, and future pathways for young innovators.

mega_events.name: Women Engineers International Summit
mega_events.description: A landmark event celebrating women in technology, entrepreneurship, and research with international speakers and workshops.
